channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Now that weâ€™ve seen how we can chain and nest multiple conditional statements in our code, we need to address a very important concept: variable scope. In programming, variable scope refers to the locations in code where variables can be accessed. Contrary to what we may think based on our experience, when we declare a variable in our code, it may not always be available everywhere.
